layout.singingstanza: Your peo -- ple will of -- fer them -- selves will -- ing -- ly In the day of Your war -- fare, In the splen -- dor of their con -- se -- cra -- tion. Your young men will be to You Like the dew from the womb of the dawn. dawn. He will drink from the brook by the way; There -- fore He will lift up His head. He will drink from the brook by the way; There -- fore He will lift up His head.

lyrics.stanza: Your people will offer themselves willingly In the day of Your warfare, In the splendor of their consecration. Your young men will be to You Like the dew from the womb of the dawn. (repeat)
